name: Alone with the ghosts
description:
You finally get to go home after serving detention at school, but when you step out of the classroom, everyone seems to have vansihed. You soon realize that somtehing much more terrible has took their place, as you have to avoid a terrifying monster while trying to gather all items necessary to escape the school.

This game was created in 1 week by 2 friends for Brackeys GameJam 2022.2. We are both first-timers and very much enjoyed it.
